cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DM, cs.CC 

The paper deals with combinatorial optimization problems, which are often studied in the subfield of computer science known as discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The paper also discusses graphical models and linear programming, which are commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The concept of persistency is related to constraint satisfaction, which is a topic in computer science theory (cs.CC) and algorithms (cs.DS). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DM, and cs.CC.
